title: Antibiotic resistance risk assessment in Mymensingh, Bangladesh: Current scenario from human-animal-environmental interfaces viewpoint
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Zakaria Al Noman, Tasnia Tabassum Anika, Ummay Humaira Safa, Safaet Alam, Subarna Sandhani Dey, Md. Nurul Huda Bhuiyan, Mahbubul Pratik Siddique, Md. Mahmudul Hasan sikder
